items.badge_description: One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 315 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below.  Try 5 more for Level 64!

At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 335 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 68! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 105 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 22!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 25 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 6!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 125 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 26!
